Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to the determination of adjusted base proportions in special assessing units which are cities
Summary: Relates to the determination of adjusted base proportions in special assessing units which are cities for fiscal year 2026.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the determination of adjusted base proportions in special assessing units which are cities
